Using Natural Language Processing, predict what the next sentence of the following text will be:
After the cat finished its playful sprint, it jumped onto the fence and began grooming itself, enjoying the warm sun on its fur. Utilize a machine learning algorithm to generate the most likely sentence to follow the given text.

To predict the next sentence using Natural Language Processing (NLP), we can use a machine learning model like a transformer-based language model, such as GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer). These models are trained on extensive datasets and can generate coherent text based on the input provided.

Given the sentence: "After the cat finished its playful sprint, it jumped onto the fence and began grooming itself, enjoying the warm sun on its fur."

The model might predict a sentence like: "Soon, it spotted a bird in the distance and its curiosity was piqued, leading it to watch intently from its perch." 

This prediction considers the context of the cat's behavior and the environment described in the initial sentence.
